divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the Velasco fielf of a friend, in the top of the mountain house, with my camera sony trv-310 and i want tu recored a real ufo. It was not my first, and appear a disk what you can see in the video that i recorded. Fithteen minutes later i recorded anotherone. Plesase see the images. I know that they are extraterrestrial, last 2008 in the last 3 moths i recorded 7 times real ufo, you can see all my films in youtube channel mel3d. Regards from Argetina.
Summary: UFO La Rioja Argentina - Cerro Velasco 21-12-2008.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rioja
